title: Bridges, Ohio
data: Bridges is an unincorporated community in Highland County, in the U.S. state of Ohio.[1] A post office was established at Bridges in 1891, and remained in operation until it was discontinued in 1905.[2] The community is named “Bridges” for the fact there were four bridges near the town site.[3] 39°18′17″N 83°31′22″W﻿ / ﻿39.30472°N 83.52278°W﻿ / 39.30472; -83.52278 This Highland County, Ohio state location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
